subject: Re: [junit] Help plzzzzzz.......
msgSnippet: ... I don t understand the statement the chapter on testing GUIs . The whole book is about testing a Swing UI, and not just one chapter. What do you mean? --
messageBody:
Ilja Preuss wrote:

> J. B. Rainsberger wrote:
>
> > Get a copy of Dave Astels, "Test-Driven Development: A Practical
> > Guide". It's the best description of testing a Swing UI with JUnit I
> > have ever seen.
>
> Well, I have to say that after skimming it for the first time, I am a
> little bit disappointed; especially about the chapter on testing GUIs.

I don't understand the statement "the chapter on testing GUIs". The
whole book is about testing a Swing UI, and not just one chapter. What
do you mean?
--
J. B. Rainsberger,
Diaspar Software Services
http://www.diasparsoftware.com :: +1 416 791-8603
Let's write software that people understand
